author: Ronan McGreevy
title: Irish Rail announces restrictions for Easter bank holiday weekend
description: Disruptions will occur on Dublin-Sligo line and on southside Dart services
content:
Irish Rail has announced a number of disruptions to its Easter services.
Essential maintenance will be carried out on the Dublin to Sligo line as well as on southside Dart services in Dublin which will impact on the Dublin-Rosslare line.
The changes are to … [+1375 chars]
